alert.note: Alert for Fresno-Tulare Foothills; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 21 at 12:12PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Kern and south central Tulare Counties through 100 PM PDT... At 1211 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Shafter, or 15 miles north of Bakersfield, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Porterville, Terra Bella, East Porterville, Ducor, Richgrove and Fountain Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
